summary: A runaway meets up with a young man in the bus station who leads her to a rendezvous with two others who are planning a bank robbery. She is convinced to drive the getaway car for $5,000 ... See full summary Â»
cast: Erika Eleniak|William McNamara|Michael Lerner|Bud Cort|Ed Lauter|Valerie Perrine|William Shockley|Leland Orser|Mark Voland|Meredith Salenger|Ed Bernard|Tim Choate|Patrick Thomas O'Brien|Dink O'Neal|Gary Anello|Robert White Cox|Jennifer Crystal Foley|Gene Borkan|Cynthia Hunter|Doug Cox|Jeanette O'Connor|Scott Vance|Arnold Diaz|Jeff Mosley
title: La chica del cadillac
